desc: Delivering fresh, organic, farmer's market quality groceries in Eugene and Springfield. Produce, pastured meat, salsa, cheese, jam, mushrooms and more. Sign up for our Bounty Box Subscription CSA (Community Supported Agriculture) or get perfectly loveable veggies in our Imperfect Produce Box.

layout.text: SIGN UP FOR A BOUNTY BOX
Local Goodness Delivered to Your Door
